channel.title: Command help ---->CLICK<----
channel.description:
Hellooo people of moparscape!!!!! Heh i finally got my server up and now im updating it. Now i have a question...
[b][u][i]IMPORTANT[/i][/u][/b] haha mkay so on my (Blank client/server) server i was running and gooin supperrr slow so i thought here ill try this for once... i typed ::noclip... BAM Auto ban ^.^.... How would i fix to the point where i noclip to meh hearts content...
[u][i][b]ALSO[/b][/i][/u] How would i change the commands of my admin and hidden admins?? (Ex. my admins cant ::pickup)

item.title: Command help ---->CLICK<----
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

1: I think noclip is a client related command, meaning you can’t do anything about it in your server files except maybe add an auto-kick for someone who isn’t staff.

2: are you sure pickup is even added? if so search for…

if(command.startsWith("pickup")

You should find somewhere around it

&& playerRights >=3

or something to do with playerRights.
anyways, just change the playerRights value to what you want. A normal player is 0, Moderators 1, Administrators 2, Owners 3 and on some servers hidden admin 4.

Read full topic
